Package model.VM

Class VendingMachine

java.lang.Object
model.VM.VendingMachine
Direct Known Subclasses:
NormalVM, SpecialVM
public abstract class VendingMachine extends Object
The VendingMachine abstract class represents a general vending machine. It provides common functionalities and properties for both NormalVM and SpecialVM.

    • findItem

      public model.core.Item findItem(String itemQuery)
      Finds an item in the vending machine based on the item name or a query.
      Parameters:
      itemQuery - the name or a part of the name of the item to search for.
      Returns:
      the first matching item found in the vending machine, or null if not found.

    • createTransaction

      public int createTransaction(model.core.Item item)
      Processes a transaction for buying an item from the vending machine.
      Parameters:
      item - the item to be purchased.
      Returns:
      the transaction result.
